resp = client.transform.preview_transform(
    source={
        "index": "kibana_sample_data_ecommerce",
        "query": {
            "bool": {
                "filter": {
                    "term": {
                        "currency": "EUR"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    latest={
        "unique_key": [
            "geoip.country_iso_code",
            "geoip.region_name"
        ],
        "sort": "order_date"
    },
)
print(resp)
